thorwin.math

Interface LU

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface LU
extends java.io.Serializable
    Lower/Upper decomposition.
    See Also:
    Wikipedia on the LU decomposition

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double det()
      Returns the determinant of the matrix.
      Matrix getL()
      Returns the lower triangular matrix
      int[] getPivot()
      Returns the pivot permutation vector
      Matrix getU()
      Returns the upper triangular matrix
      java.util.Optional<Matrix> solve(Matrix matrix)
      Solves A×X = B.

    • Method Detail

      • getL

        Matrix getL()
        Returns the lower triangular matrix
        Returns:
        matrix L

      • getU

        Matrix getU()
        Returns the upper triangular matrix
        Returns:
        matrix U

      • solve

        java.util.Optional<Matrix> solve(Matrix matrix)
        Solves A×X = B. Where A is the matrix that was decomposed, B the other matrix.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the other matrix (B)
        Returns:
        the solution matrix, if any

      • getPivot

        int[] getPivot()
        Returns the pivot permutation vector
        Returns:
        array of indices

      • det

        double det()
        Returns the determinant of the matrix. The matrix must be square to be ably to determine the discriminant.
        Returns:
        determinant
